experience.title: Wine's quality prediction
info: Apply several encoding techniques and try different ML models in a case where only categorical features are provided
Try different data cleaning processes and use a grid-search approach to achieve the best result

experience.title: Incremental Learning in Semantic Segmentation
info: Work in an incremental scenario dealing with neural networks' catastrophic forgetting problem
Extend the case to weak supervised scenario where only classes' seeds are provided

experience.title: Retinal vessels Segmentation
info: Reduce the burden of data annotation with an active machine learning framework on a patch basis
Segment eyes' vessels in a weak supervised scenario achieving a satisfactory result
